name: Girl Raid
description:
Story background

Skynet Technology illegally manufactures a doomsday war robot, which has extremely high combat effectiveness and has threatened national security
Organize and arrange for you to sneak into the enemy base, destroy the doomsday robot before it is fully debugged, and capture the master boss of this project, the Boss King

Girl protagonist

Not only has a rich shooting experience, but also accompanied by the beautiful girl protagonist
have a dialogue

How to play

Look down and shoot, pass through the five-layered defense of Skynet Technology, and reach the inside of the factory.
There are 5 levels, with increasing difficulty
Weapons are stun gun, musket, ice gun, pistol, cannon, machine gun, grenade
You only have one life. If you come back after death, you can get gold coins that are permanently valid. Gold coins can be used to buy props at the beginning of the game.
Items can increase life, increase weapons and bullets, etc. After playing several times and getting gold coins, you can buy items to pass the level.
